means: 拒绝相信( disbelieve的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Disbelieving in the necessity of large - scale production in the modern world , he is passionately devoted to excessive secrecy, both in finance and ( in ) method of production.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于不相信当今世界上 大规模生产 的必要性, 他们热衷于财政和生产方法上的过分保密.

sentence.Network_en: He is always disbelieving, no matter what people say.
sentence.Network_cn: 任随大家说什么,他总是不相信.

sentence.Network_en: Disbelieving his unlikely story, she looked askance at Jack.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用怀疑的目光看着杰克,不相信他那靠不住的叙述.

PerfectNetExp.abs: disbelieve 不信disbelieving 怀疑的disbelievingly 怀疑地
阅读技巧——观点态度题_handnna_新浪博客 ... Serious 严肃的，认真的 Disbelieving 怀疑的，不相信的 Ironic 说反话的，讽刺的.

list.abs: I disbelieve in UFOs ., 我不相信幽.
Please believe yourself but disbelieve the world ., 请相信你自己但不要相信这个世界.
I said " Really ? " in a disbelieving tone , but leaned forward to kiss her anyway .我用怀疑的口气问道：“真的吗？”，并凑过去吻她。
Palestinians therefore utterly disbelieve American protestations of even - handedness ., 因此 , 巴勒斯坦完全不相信美国会所宣称的公正无私.

entry.tran: 不相信，怀疑(某人或某人的话)
entry.def: If you disbelieve someone or disbelieve something that they say, you do not believe that what they say is true.

example.ex: There is no reason to disbelieve him...
He had never been able to disbelieve it completely.
example.tran: 他从未能够对此予以全盘否定。

entry.tran: 不相信(某事存在或有用)
entry.def: If you disbelieve in something, you do not believe that it exists or that it works.

means.word_mean: 1. denying or questioning the tenets of especially a religion;

sentences.sentence: "a skeptical approach to the nature of miracles"

auth_sentence.content: He looks slightly lost and happy and absolutely disbelieving.
auth_sentence.res_content: He looks slightly lost and happy and absolutely disbelieving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He looks slightly lost and happy and absolutely disbelieving.

auth_sentence.content: Disbelieving will not make a true story false.
auth_sentence.res_content: Disbelieving will not make a true story false.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Disbelieving will not make a true story false.

auth_sentence.content: The evidence is everywhere you just have to open your eyes and stop disbelieving, stop doubting.
auth_sentence.res_content: The evidence is everywhere you just have to open your eyes and stop disbelieving, stop doubting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The evidence is everywhere you just have to open your eyes and stop disbelieving, stop doubting.
